customer.id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the campaign budget.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.aligned_bidding_strategy.description: The ID of the bidding strategy aligned with the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.amount_micros.description: The amount in micros (millionths of the currency unit) for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.delivery_method.description: The delivery method of the campaign budget (ACCELERATED or STANDARD).

campaign_budget.explicitly_shared.description: Indicates whether the budget is explicitly shared among multiple campaigns.

campaign_budget.has_recommended_budget.description: Indicates if there is a recommended budget for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.id.description: The ID of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.name.description: The name of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.period.description: The time period covered by the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.recommended_budget_amoun.description: The recommended amount in micros for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.recommended_budget_estim.description: Estimated change in weekly clicks if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly cost in micros if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly interactions if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly views if recommended budget is applied.

campaign_budget.reference_count.description: The count of references to the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.resource_name.description: The resource name of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.status.description: The status of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.total_amount_micros.description: The total amount in micros of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.type.description: The type of the campaign budget.

segments.date.description: Date segment used for filtering data.

segments.budget_campaign_association_sta.description: The campaign associated with the budget and its status.
The status of the budget association with the campaign.

metrics.all_conversions.description: The total number of conversions for all conversion actions.

metrics.all_conversions_from_interaction.description: The rate of conversions from interactions out of all interactions.

metrics.all_conversions_value.description: The total value of all conversions.

metrics.average_cost.description: The average cost of interactions for the campaign.

metrics.average_cpc.description: The average cost per click for the campaign.

metrics.average_cpe.description: The average cost per engagement for the campaign.

metrics.average_cpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions for the campaign.

metrics.average_cpv.description: The average cost per view for the campaign.

metrics.clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the campaign.

metrics.conversions.description: The total number of conversions for the campaign.

metrics.conversions_from_interactions_ra.description: The rate of conversions out of all interactions.

metrics.conversions_value.description: The total value of conversions for the campaign.

metrics.cost_micros.description: The total cost in micros for the campaign.

metrics.cost_per_all_conversions.description: The cost per all conversions for the campaign.

metrics.cost_per_conversion.description: The cost per conversion for the campaign.

metrics.cross_device_conversions.description: The total number of cross-device conversions for the campaign.

metrics.ctr.description: The click-through rate for the campaign.

metrics.engagement_rate.description: The engagement rate for the campaign.

metrics.engagements.description: The total number of engagements for the campaign.

metrics.impressions.description: The total number of impressions for the campaign.

metrics.interaction_event_types.description: Types of interactions tracked for the campaign.

metrics.interaction_rate.description: The interaction rate for the campaign.

metrics.interactions.description: The total number of interactions for the campaign.

metrics.value_per_all_conversions.description: The value per all conversions for the campaign.

metrics.value_per_conversion.description: The value per conversion for the campaign.

metrics.video_view_rate.description: The view rate for video ads in the campaign.

metrics.video_views.description: The total number of video views for the campaign.

metrics.view_through_conversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions for the campaign.
